title: [Client] Champion Mastery Name Mix-Ups
body: Okay, so I was filing through my champions, and everything looked right until I reached the ones I hadn't leveled any mastery with. And I see Quinn's portrait colored in (and I know that she's not on free week), but I don't have her, so I'm like "um..?" And then when I glance around, I realize I don't have Renekton or Rumble either. But I DO own the names they're listed above (Brand, Ezreal, and Caitlyn). The thing with Orianna/Gnar is that I own both of them, so obviously the problem isn't exclusive to champions I don't own. I just noticed this today, and all the champions past these when I scrolled down were correct, and Orianna was listed above her name. So, basically, her portrait is there twice. After I refreshed the champions tab, it was all back to normal, but still thought it was worth reporting.
